blogPost.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new
blogPost.body: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new
blogPost.title: Walling Templates - Plan and organize everything, with zero friction
blogPost.author: Aaron  O'Leary

localize.description: 发现 Walling 的强大功能，并使用新的 Walling 模板启动您的下一个项目。没有复杂的工作流程。不需要浪费大量时间去设置那些无法使用的随机模板。有了 Walling，一切都很简单，只需把它贴在墙上即可! 开始一面新墙：https://wall.new
localize.tagline: 计划和组织一切，零摩擦

localize.description: 發現 Walling 的強大功能，並使用新的 Walling 模板啓動您的下一個項目。沒有複雜的工作流程。不需要浪費大量時間去設置那些無法使用的隨機模板。有了 Walling，一切都很簡單，只需把它貼在牆上即可! 開始一面新牆：https://wall.new
localize.tagline: 計劃和組織一切，零摩擦

previous.excerpt: Coupler.io synchronizes data between Airtable, Clockify, Shopify, Trello, etc., and Google Sheets allowing you to bring data into a single place and customize your reporting. Try Coupler.io Free-forever plan now and auto-import up to 50K rows per month!
previous.title: Coupler.io - Pull data from apps on a schedule with no coding required

localize.description: Coupler.io可以在Airtable、Clockify、Shopify、Trello等和Google Sheets之间同步数据，让您将数据集中到一个地方，并自定义您的报告。现在就试试Coupler.io免费计划，每月自动导入多达5万行的数据。
localize.tagline: 按计划从应用程序中提取数据，无需编码。

localize.description: Coupler.io可以在Airtable、Clockify、Shopify、Trello等和Google Sheets之間同步數據，讓您將數據集中到一個地方，並自定義您的報告。現在就試試Coupler.io免費計劃，每月自動導入多達5萬行的數據。
localize.tagline: 按計劃從應用程序中提取數據，無需編碼。
